TopicTitle: mission builder: spawning vessels in solar orbits

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to create a rescue mission from a solar orbit near Kerbins Orbit, but when creating the spawning node, I can't set semi mayor axis to values greater than 2616000000 (wich is way inside Moho's orbit).

 

Edited March 13, 2018 by Human Person

Hi there, 

From your description, you are trying to set the semi major axis using the slider only. The button that displays the value may also be used to enter values directly.

I have noted this for feedback and improvements.

1 hour ago, Squelch said:

The button that displays the value may also be used to enter values directly.

I tried this, but the value still refuses to surpass this threshold.
